StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMediaInfoBySchoolRowGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT
[MediaInfoID], mi.[TypeID] As MediaTypeID, mt.Descrip.on AS MediaTypeName,
mi.Organiza.onID, mi.[Descripton] As MediaName, cp.[CollegePro.leID], poc.[PointOfContactID], cp.School_code AS SchoolCode, cp.FiscalYear, poc.[PointOfContactID], [POCLastName], [POCLegalMiddleName],[POCFirstName], [Street1],poc.[Street2],poc.[City],[State],[ZipCode], [TelephoneNumber],[CellPhoneNumber], [FaxNumber],[EmailAddress],[ValueToOSS],[Remarks]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC]. MediaType mt
INNER JOIN [MediaInfo] mi ON mt.MediaTypeID = mi.TypeID
INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].PointOfContact poc ON mi.PointOfContactID = poc.PointOfContactID INNER JOIN [CollegePro.le] cp ON mi.[CollegePro.leID]= cp.[CollegePro.leID] INNER JOIN dbo.HIGH_SCHOOL hs ON cp.SCHOOL_CODE = hs.SCHOOL_CODE
WHERE hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode AND cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
